Auckland taxi shock: Crown Cabs driver charges tourists $163 for journey less than 10km https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-taxi-shock-crown-cabs-driver-charges-tourists-163-for-journey-less-than-10km/Z7OGF6M4CFFMJD3SY4GPHQ3BUI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-taxi-shock-crown-cabs-driver-charges-tourists-163-for-journey-less-than-10km/Z7OGF6M4CFFMJD3SY4GPHQ3BUI/ Benjamin Plummer'The air was blue when he said the price,' fleeced passenger says.
